Response: The pace was good! It was easier to follow today than last time - thank you for explaining each function as we went and for demonstrating the answer to questions. It would be helpful to have the practice problem answers written somewhere in the document so we can refer to it at home.

The pace was really great. If there are a few more opportunities to test out and practice the concepts, that would be helpful. But we did a great job of covering new material quickly and implementing it. It might also be helpful for you to recommend other practice problems for us to do on our own time. I've been reviewing the DataCamp lessons, but I have to sift through a lot of review material to get to more practice.
